sentences.en: And by applying biogas slurry, photosynthesis rates is 16.622 μ mol · cm - 2· s - 1 , improving 26.029 % by CK.
sentences.cn: 当单施沼液时, 光合速率平均值达到16.622μmol.cm -2.s-1, 高出对照26.029%.

sentences.en: Applied to valve k pump, granule pump and coal slurry pump.
sentences.cn: 泵、煤浆泵 、 污水泵等含杂质颗粒介质的设备.

sentences.en: Ethyl acetate ( 71 . 41 b ) was added to the slurry in the vessel.
sentences.cn: 把醋酸乙酯 71.4 磅加到容器中的浆液内.

sentences.en: Excess acidity is corrected in the slurry storage tanks.
sentences.cn: 过量的酸在料浆贮槽中进一步中和.

sentences.en: Gaseous, liquid, or slurry propellants may be used in various combinations.
sentences.cn: 气态, 液体或胶状推进剂可能用于各种不同组合中.

sentences.en: It effectively controls the rheology of slurry, with good non - Newtonian fluid performance.
sentences.cn: 能很好地控制泥浆的流变性, 具有良好的 非 牛顿流体性.

sentences.en: It is not practical to introduce ammonia and carbon dioxide separatily into the gypsum slurry.
sentences.cn: 将氨和二氧化碳分别通进石膏料浆是不切实际的.

sentences.en: Stirred tank applicable to all industries laboratory wet slurry mixing materials.
sentences.cn: 搅拌槽适用于各行业实验室湿法搅拌浆体物料.

sentences.en: Temperature is controlled by adding water to the slurry.
sentences.cn: 靠将水加入料浆中以控制温度.

sentences.en: The cylinder is filled with the slurry to be studied.
sentences.cn: 量筒内注满待研究的泥浆.

sentences.en: The gypsum slurry is pumped into a diked area.
sentences.cn: 我们用泵将石膏料浆打到一块用堤围起来的空地中.

sentences.en: The nitrocellulose and water slurry was transferred to a centrifuge.
sentences.cn: 把硝化棉和水的浆液转移到离心机中.

sentences.en: The slurry apparent viscosity has exponent relation to the solid volume content.
sentences.cn: 矿浆表观粘度与固体体积含量呈指数关系.

sentences.en: The slurry feed system offers the only continuous feed possibility of the three methods investigated.
sentences.cn: 煤粉浆加料装置是所研究的这三种加料方法中唯一可能实现连续加料的一种方法.

sentences.en: Two gypsum slurry pumps are provided for the absorber system.
sentences.cn: 在吸收塔系统中,配有两台石膏浆液泵.

phrases.tran_cn: 泥浆输送管；输浆管道；煤浆管道
泥浆墙；槽壁；地下连续壁

trans.tran_en: a mixture of water and mud, coal, or animal waste
